title: Peanut Cookies with Yummi Nuts with Salt
ingredients: 1 cup of Yummi Nuts Peanut with Salt
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350º F.
Step 2: In a bowl, cream the sugars with the margarine with an electric mixer.
Step 3: Add the vanilla and the egg.
Step 4: Then the flour and mix well.
Step 5: Add the peanuts and stir with a wooden paddle.
Step 6: Spoon mixture into greased cookie sheet, leaving two inches between each.
Step 8: Let them cool on a rack and pour the chocolate on top making lines.
